title: Hand Battle
description: A simple rock paper scissor game built with Angular

helpPage.heading: How to play
helpPage.intro:
Hand Battle is two player game. Both players simultaneously pick on of the hand gestures and winner is one who's gesture has supremacy. If both players pick the same gesture, game is draw. Game can be played in one or multiple rounds.

There are two available play modes: Human versus computer - you can pick gesture manually and Computer versus Computer - computer randomly picks a gesture for you. By pressing GO button your chosen gesture is opposed to your opponent's.

Game is available in two versions:
helpPage.author: Author: Miroslav Jonas
